Histogram &  si,
Histogram &  si_before 
)

Fit splines to contour points in each contour in this object.

Parameters:
[in] h Instance of Histogram class for sample point deviations.
[in] si Instance of Histogram class for sample intervals after simulated annealing.
[in] si_before Instance of Histogram class for sample intervals before simulated annealing.

References Histogram::getN(), Controls::getPrintDetailedInfo(), Controls::getPtPerContourThreshold(), Controls::instance(), Histogram::scan(), and Histogram::update().
